name: Stealth Bastard Deluxe
description:
Default Linux version only works on Ubuntu and has numerous problems.

This version works well using staging-3.5 with dmusic, dsound, and directmusic winetricks.
content:
game:
  appid: 209190
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dmusic
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dsound
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directmusic
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
